sentences.en: After leaf excision , the leaf progressively lost the ability to convert amino acids to protein.
sentences.cn: 在叶子切掉以后就逐渐失去把氨基酸转化为蛋白质的能力.

sentences.en: It may progressively remove the constraints on degradation discussed earlier.
sentences.cn: 这样可逐渐除去前面讨论过的对降解的抑制.

sentences.en: It'should progressively group these individuals according to the similarities between these groups.
sentences.cn: 根据这些行为之间的相似之处,应该进一步将这些人分组.

sentences.en: The bank has progressively increased its liquidity.
sentences.cn: 银行逐渐地增加其流动资产.

sentences.en: The earlier good humour and high spirits give way to a progressively despairing vision.
sentences.cn: 先前那种快活的幽默和高昂的情绪统统让位于对一切渐感失望的看法.

sentences.en: The hiatus in sedimentation is filled in progressively from below.
sentences.cn: 沉积间断面是从下边逐渐填满的.

sentences.en: The incidence of gallstones increases progressively with age.
sentences.cn: 胆石症的发病率随年龄而逐渐增高.

sentences.en: The output increases progressively with years.
The residue is progressively enriched in carbon.
sentences.cn: 残留部分愈来愈富含碳质.

sentences.en: The situation was becoming progressively more difficult.
sentences.cn: 局势变得愈发困难起来。

sentences.en: This means that they progressively double.
sentences.cn: 这就意味着它是以累进方式倍增.

sentences.en: Thursday , Friday , and Saturday were progressively worse, so they ended up choosing Wednesday - "
sentences.cn: 四五六一 天坏似一天, 结果他们挑的是星期三—— ”

sentences.en: We progressively divide this population into classes and sub - classes.
sentences.cn: 我们将这些人口逐步划分为阶层和次阶层.

trans.tran_cn: 前进地，日益增加地，逐步
